Jargon Term: It is very important that you do not stop ANY of your medications until you speak with your cardiologist.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Medication changes: DECREASE enalapril to 5mg daily (for blood pressure) STOP hydrochlorothiazine (for blood pressure)
STOP simvastatin (this has been replaced by another cholesterol med)
START clopidogrel 75mg daily (blood thinner) DO NOT STOP WITHOUT DISCUSSING WITH YOUR CARDIOLOGIST
DO NOT STOP WITHOUT DISCUSSING WITH YOUR CARDIOLOGIST
